x-sap-shortText: Manage sales tax information on invoices.

info.title: Sales Tax Validation Request
info.description: An invoice is a bill of sale for goods or services. This API provides invoice information so that clients can calculate appropriate sales tax for invoice items. It also allows clients to update the invoice with the calculated sales tax.

OAuth2.description: To use this API, you need to get OAuth client credentials (client ID, secret, and geolocation) from SAP Concur, and be authorized to use the relevant scope. Refer to the full authentication information for more information.

get.description: Gets invoices for the purpose of calculating sales tax.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting point of the next set of results, after the limit specified in the limit field has been reached.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of invoices to retrieve. Maximum value: 1000

parameters.name: modifiedafter
parameters.description: A parameter that can be used to limit the results to invoices modified after the specified date.

put.summary: Update invoices with the calculated tax information
put.description: Updates the specified invoices with the calculated tax amount and tax rate.

parameters.name: invoice
parameters.description: The tax information for the invoice that is to be updated.
